name: Research Assistant Agent
description: An AI agent that helps with research tasks and information retrieval.

authentication.description: OAuth 2.0 authentication is required to use this agent

skills.name: Information Retrieval
skills.description: Searches and retrieves relevant information from various sources based on user queries.
examples: Find information about machine learning techniques
Retrieve recent papers on climate change

skills.name: Content Summarization
skills.description: Summarizes articles, papers, and other text content into concise formats.
examples: Give me a brief overview of this article
